question: The "Ore Mountain Mining Region" is located in between which two countries?
explanation: Ore Mountain Mining Region, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located in between the Czech Republic and Germany. It is an 800 years old industrial heritage landscape located in the Ore Mountains on the German-Czech border. The historic mining industry of the region produced and processed ores of silver, lead, zinc, cobalt, nickel, copper, iron, tin, anthracite and uranium which contributed towards the economic development of the regions.
